column2: Therefore,  the  revisionary  powers  of this  Coyrt shall  not  be  exercised  when  there
was  no  illegality,  irregularity or failure  of justice in  aforesaid orders.  I observe that

in 
the  present  case  also  there  had  been  no  miscarriage  of justice,  irregularity  or

injustice  in 
the  order  of the  Learned  Magistrate  and  therefore  the  Learned  High

Court  Judge  was  correct  in 
refusing  to 
interfere  with 
the  order  of the  Learned
Magistrate  due  to  absence of exceptional  circumstances.  We  affirm  both orders of

the  Learned  Magistrate  and 
the  Learned  High  Court  Judge  Galle  dated  on
